definition[0]: very friendly and willing to talk a lot
example[0]: Hauser was in an expansive mood.
definition[1]: very large in area, or using a lot of space
example[2]: She flung her arms out in an expansive gesture.
definition[2]: including a lot of information and using a lot of words
example[4]: It was written in an expansive style.
definition[3]: relating to a business or economy becoming bigger or more successful
